EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Equipped bows gain a +1 Enhancement bonus for each Arcane Archer core ability you possess (stacks with everything). All bows are treated as Implements in your hands, granting Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Morphic Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Secondary Imbue Toggle: Your arrows deal bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. Activation Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 10 seconds.

Stance.Name: Morphic Arrows
Stance.Description: Your arrows deal bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Metalline Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Secondary Imbue Toggle: Your arrows bypass all metallic damage reduction. Activation Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 10 seconds.

Stance.Name: Metalline Arrows
Stance.Description: Your arrows bypass all metallic damage reduction

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Aligned Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Secondary Imbue Toggle: Your arrows bypass all alignment based damage reduction. Activation Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 10 seconds.

Stance.Name: Aligned Arrows
Stance.Description: Your arrows bypass all alignment based damage reduction.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Shadow Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Secondary Imbue Toggle: +5% Doubleshot chance with bows. Activation Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 10 seconds.
Doubleshot: Your ranged attacks gain a percent chance to attack with an extra projectile. Repeating Crossbows have a reduced chance to produce extra shots.
Passive: Equipped bows gains a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Damage Multiplier.

Stance.Name: Shadow Arrows
Stance.Description: +5% Doubleshot chance with bows

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Mystical Archer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
+4 Dexterity, +20% Doubleshot.
Doubleshot: Your ranged attacks gain a percent chance to attack with an extra projectile. Repeating Crossbows have a reduced chance to produce extra shots.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Conjure Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to create a stack of returning +1 arrows. These arrows are destroyed when you log out for an extended period of time.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: True strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Archery Attack: Perform a ranged attack with +20 to hit. You receive a +4 Insight bonus to hit for 12 seconds. Activation cost: 2 spell points. Cooldown: 3 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Energy of the Wild
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[30/60/100] maximum spell points. Rank 3: You gain the Magical Training feat. Anti-requisite: Cannot take Rank 3 if you already have the Magical Training feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Elemental Arrows I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four elemental arrow imbues. (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 Seconds) Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Corrosive Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Corrosive, dealing 1d6 acid damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Name: Corrosive Arrows
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Corrosive, dealing 1d6 acid damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Flaming Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Flaming, dealing 1d6 fire damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Name: Flaming Arrows
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Flaming, dealing 1d6 fire damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Frost Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Frost, dealing 1d6 cold damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Name: Frost Arrows
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Frost, dealing 1d6 cold damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shock Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Shock, dealing 1d6 electrical damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Name: Shock Arrows
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Shock, dealing 1d6 electrical damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Awareness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Listen, Search, Spot and to-hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Dispelling Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Deals +30% Damage. Activation Cost: 5 SP. Cooldown: 3 seconds Ranged Archery Attack: Performs a ranged attack that dispels 3 beneficial effects from your target.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Force Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Imbue Toggle: You imbue your arrows with magical force. Your arrows gain On Hit: 1d6 force damage and the Ghost Touch ability. This damage scales with Spell Power. Activation Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 10 seconds

Stance.Name: Force Arrows
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: You imbue your arrows with magical force. Your arrows gain On Hit: 1d6 force damage and the Ghost Touch ability. This damage scales with Spell Power. Activation Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 10 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Elemental Inferno
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Elemental Inferno: AOE Ranged Archery Attack: Fire a single shot with +10% Damage, hitting every enemy in an area around where the shot hits with magical flames that can change their element. Affected enemies take 1 stack of Elemental Inferno. (Target takes 1d6 damage every 2 second for 6 seconds. This is Fire damage, unless you have Corrosive, Frost, Shock or Force Arrows active, in which case the damage type is the type of your Imbue. Elemental Inferno's damage scales with the relevant Spell Power. This effect can stack 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.) Activation cost: 6 SP. Cooldown 3 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Elemental Arrows II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four elemental arrow imbues or Deal +2 Imbue dice Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Corrosive Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Corrosive, dealing 1d6 acid damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power +1 bonus Imbue Dice

Stance.Name: Corrosive Arrows
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Corrosive, dealing 1d6 acid damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Flaming Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Flaming, dealing 1d6 fire damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power +1 bonus Imbue Dice

Stance.Name: Flaming Arrows
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Flaming, dealing 1d6 fire damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Frost Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Frost, dealing 1d6 cold damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power +1 bonus Imbue Dice

Stance.Name: Frost Arrows
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Frost, dealing 1d6 cold damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shock Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Shock, dealing 1d6 electrical damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power +1 bonus Imbue Dice

Stance.Name: Shock Arrows
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Shock, dealing 1d6 electrical damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Elemental Damage
EnhancementSelection.Description: Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power +2 bonus Imbue Dice

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Action Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select Attack or Energy Resistance boost.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Attack Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +[4/6/8] action boost bonus to hit for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Energy Resistance Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +[5/10/15] action boost bonus to Energy Resistance for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Shattermantle Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Deals +30% Damage Activation Cost: 4 SP. Cooldown: 3 seconds Ranged Archery Attack: On hit: Target gains 3 stacks of Reduced Spell Resistance (-1 Spell Resistance. This effect can stack 100 times). On Vorpal Hit: Shattermantle (-100 spell Resistance for 10 seconds. Will DC 18 + Half Ranger Level + Wisdom Modifier negates.)

DC.Name: Arcane Archer: Shattermantle Shot
DC.Description: Deals +30% Damage Activation Cost: 4 SP. Cooldown: 3 seconds Ranged Archery Attack: On hit: Target gains 3 stacks of Reduced Spell Resistance (-1 Spell Resistance. This effect can stack 100 times). On Vorpal Hit: Shattermantle (-100 spell Resistance for 10 seconds. Will DC 18 + Half Ranger Level + Wisdom Modifier negates.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Terror Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Imbue Toggle: You imbue your arrows with negative energy. Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds
On Hit: Target is feared. (Will save vs. DC: 20 + Wisdom Modifier + Enchantment Spell Bonuses) On Vorpal: Target is subject to a Phantasmal Killer effect. Passive: +1 bonus to DC of Enchantment Spells

Stance.Name: Terror Arrows
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: You imbue your arrows with negative energy. On Hit: Target is feared. (Will save vs. DC: 20 + Wisdom Modifier + Enchantment Spell Bonuses) On Vorpal: Target is subject to a Phantasmal Killer effect.

DC.Name: Arcane Archer: Terror Arrows
DC.Description: Imbue Toggle: You imbue your arrows with negative energy. On Hit: Target is feared. On Vorpal: Target is subject to a Phantasmal Killer effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Soul Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Every time you strike an enemy with your bow, you have a 15% chance to gain 10 temporary spell points that last for 1 minute. +10 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Elemental Arrows III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four elemental arrow imbues (Can't choose the same type again), or +1 Imbue Dice. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Corrosive Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Corrosive, dealing 1d6 acid damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power +1 bonus Imbue Dice

Stance.Name: Corrosive Arrows
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Corrosive, dealing 1d6 acid damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Flaming Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Flaming, dealing 1d6 fire damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power +1 bonus Imbue Dice

Stance.Name: Flaming Arrows
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Flaming, dealing 1d6 fire damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Frost Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Frost, dealing 1d6 cold damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power +1 bonus Imbue Dice

Stance.Name: Frost Arrows
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Frost, dealing 1d6 cold damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shock Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Shock, dealing 1d6 electrical damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power +1 bonus Imbue Dice

Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Shock, dealing 1d6 electrical damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Elemental Damage
EnhancementSelection.Description: Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power +2 bonus Imbue Dice

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Banishing Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain On Vorpal: Banish an extra-planar creature back to their home plane. (Will save vs. DC 20 + Wisdom modifier + Enchantment Spell bonuses) On hit: Inflict Pull of Reality (-1 PRR/MRR, stacks up to 25 times. 5 stacks fade away every 3 seconds). Instant kill does not affect bosses. Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds

Stance.Name: Banishing Arrows
Stance.Description: Your arrows gain On Vorpal: Banish an extra-planar creature back to their home plane. On hit: Inflict Pull of Reality (-1 PRR/MRR, stacks up to 25 times. 5 stacks fade away every 3 seconds).

DC.Name: Arcane Archer: Banishing Arrows
DC.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain On Vorpal: Banish an extra-planar creature back to their home plane. On hit: Inflict Pull of Reality (-1 PRR/MRR, stacks up to 25 times. 5 stacks fade away every 3 seconds).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Paralyzing Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Imbue Toggle: You imbue your arrows with paralyzing force. On Hit: Target is paralyzed. (Will save vs. DC 20 + Wisdom modifier + Enchantment Spell Bonuses) On Save: -10% Movement and Attack speed. Passive: +1 bonus to DC of Enchantment Spells. Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds

Stance.Name: Paralyzing Arrows
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: You imbue your arrows with paralyzing force. On Hit: Target is paralyzed. (Will save vs. DC 20 + Wisdom modifier + Enchantment Spell Bonuses) On Save: -10% Movement and Attack speed.

DC.Name: Arcane Archer: Paralyzing Arrows
DC.Description: Imbue Toggle: You imbue your arrows with paralyzing force. On Hit: Target is paralyzed. (Will save vs. DC 20 + Wisdom modifier + Enchantment Spell Bonuses) On Save: -10% Movement and Attack speed.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Smiting Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain On Vorpal: Destroy a construct. (Will save vs. DC 20 + Wisdom modifier + Enchantment Spell Bonuses). Passive: +1 bonus to DC of Enchantment Spells. On Hit: Inflicts Deconstructed (Reduced attack speed, -25% Fortification, -25% healing from Repair) Instant kill does not affect bosses. Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds

Stance.Name: Smiting Arrows
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain On Vorpal: Destroy a construct. (Will save vs. DC 20 + Wisdom modifier + Enchantment Spell Bonuses). Passive: +1 bonus to DC of Enchantment Spells. On Hit: Inflicts Deconstructed (Reduced attack speed, -25% Fortification, -25% healing from Repair)

DC.Name: Arcane Archer: Smiting Arrows
DC.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain On Vorpal: Destroy a construct. (Will save vs. DC 20 + Wisdom modifier + Enchantment Spell Bonuses). Passive: +1 bonus to DC of Enchantment Spells. On Hit: Inflicts Deconstructed (Reduced attack speed, -25% Fortification, -25% healing from Repair)

EnhancementSelection.Description: Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power +2 bonus Imbue Dice

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Moonbow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While wielding a bow, once every 30 seconds you gain 20 temporary spell points for 10 seconds. +10 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Arrow of Slaying
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Archery Attack: Performs a ranged attack with +250% damage and +25 flat damage. (This damage can be multiplied by critical hits.) Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Opening Volley
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: AOE Ranged Archery Attack: Fire a single shot with +20% Damage, hitting every enemy in an area around where this shot hits. Enemies hit take 7 stacks of Vulnerability. Cost: 5 spell points. Cooldown: 18 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Improved Elemental Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Elemental Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Your elemental arrow imbues gain On Critical: 1d10-3d10 elemental damage based on critical multiplier and an additional effect:
Corrosive Arrows: Your arrows gain the Destruction ability. (On Damage: target receives a -1 AC and -1% Fortification for the next 20 seconds. If the effect is reapplied before it wears off, the effect will stack and the duration will reset. This effect can be stacked up to 15 times.)
Flaming Arrows: Your arrows gain On Critical Hit: Target gains 1 stack of Burning (Target takes 1d6 fire damage every 2 seconds for 6 second. This effect can stack 20 times and loses one stack on expiration.)
Frost Arrows: Your arrows gain On Critical Hit: Target gains 1 stack of Lethargy (You have -1 to all Saving throws. Non-bosses also move and attack 5% slower. This effect stacks up to 5 times.)
Shock Arrows: Your arrows gain On Critical Hit: Vulnerable (Target takes 1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times and loses one stack on expiration.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Elemental Damage
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 bonus Imbue Dice +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Runebow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Bows you wield gain an additional +2 Enhancement bonus. This is considered a Magic Weapon effect. (Does not stack with the spell Enchant Weapons.)
